p: Since then, by implementing the diagnostic algorithms of gastroenteritis cases with NoV-specific molecular assays, canine NoVs have been repeatedly detected [ 42, 44, 45, 46, 47], revealing a marked genetic diversity among the strains identified that allowed their classification into at least five genotypes from three distinct genogroups, i.e., GIV.2, GVI.1, GVI.2, GVI.3, and GVII [ 47].
